billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Provides that directors are not required to provide their address on certificates of incorporation
summary: Provides that directors are not required to provide their address on certificates of incorporation.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1166

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. BING, REILLY, MILLMAN, JAFFEE, CAMARA, CAHILL,
         CASTRO -- Multi-Sponsored by --  M.  of  A.  DenDEKKER,  MAGEE,  MENG,
         RAMOS, WEISENBERG -- read once and referred to the Committee on Corpo-
         rations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  not-for-profit  corporation law, in relation to
         certificates of incorporation

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Subparagraph 4 of paragraph (a) of section 402 of the not-
    2  for-profit corporation law, as amended by chapter 679  of  the  laws  of
    3  1985, is amended to read as follows:
    4    (4)  [In the case of a Type A, Type B, or Type C corporation, the] THE
    5  names and [addresses] CITY AND STATE OF RESIDENCE of the initial  direc-
    6  tors.  [In  the case of a Type D corporation, the names and addresses of
    7  the initial directors, if any, may but need not be set forth.]
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01122-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to certificates of incorporation
